Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_DLS_get_info

The function AIL_DLS_get_info retrieves information about the specified DLS device.

void AIL_DLS_get_info(
  HDLSDEVICE dls,
  AILDLSINFO *info,
  S32 *PercentCPU
);

In Parameters

dls
indicates the DLS device to query.

Out Parameters

info
is an address of an AILDLSINFO structure that will contain the DLS info.
PercentCPU
is a pointer to an integer that will contain the percentage of CPU that the software synthesizer is using since the last call to AIL_DLS_get_info.


Group: DLS Services
Related Functions: AIL_DLS_get_info
Related Basic Types: HDLSDEVICE, S32, void
Related Structures: AILDLSINFO
